SELECT
b.store_id storeId, b.store_name storeName, concat(c.area_name,d.area_name,e.area_name,b.address) address,
b.invite_code inviteCode, a.version,
a.phone, a.version,
a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_image userImage, a.user_name userName FROM t_sys_user a
LEFT JOIN t_info_store b ON b.is_delete = 0 AND b.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_info_client f ON f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.invite_code = b.invite_code
LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level c ON c.area_id = b.province_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level d ON d.area_id = b.city_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level e ON e.area_id = b.area_id
WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_user SET user_password = #{userNewPassword}, update_time = NOW( ), update_user = #{updateUser}, version = version + 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
